# GearVerify Laboratory

> The Sovereign Hardware Validation Standard.

GearVerify is a browser-based hardware diagnostic tool that uses WebGPU Compute Shaders to benchmark GPU, CPU, and RAM performance without server-side processing.

## Core Tools

- [GPU Stress Test](https://gearverify.com/gpu/) - WebGPU-based compute stress test.
- [CPU Load Test](https://gearverify.com/cpu/) - Multi-core logic validation.
- [RAM Integrity](https://gearverify.com/ram/) - Memory bandwidth and volatility checking.

## Technical Documentation

- [WebGPU vs WebGL](https://gearverify.com/guides/webgpu-vs-webgl-performance.html)
- [Interpretation Guide](https://gearverify.com/guides/gpu-stress-test-explained.html)
- [Privacy Protocol](https://gearverify.com/privacy.html)

## APIs

We do not currently offer a public REST API. All validation is performed client-side.
